HOW_IT_WORKS.SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Look for cities and activities, compare the possibilities to see what suits you better.
HOW_IT_WORKS.CONNECT_DESCRIPTION: Contact the best professionals and schedule a date for your adventure.
HOW_IT_WORKS.ADVENTURE_DESCRIPTION: Have an extraordinary experience, free yourself, overcome your limits. And then rate the activity for people who will come after you have even more information.
